resources.string: We have sent a code to your email
We have sent a code to your phone number
Joyers are categorized into different statuses based on their titles, which determine their roles and functionalities within the app. Here is an overview of these statuses:
<font color="#D69E3A">Celebrity</font> : Celebrities are Joyers recognized or certified by a local or international organization.
<font color="#D69E3A">Proficient</font> : Proficient Joyers are professionals or individuals skilled in a specific field.
<font color="#D69E3A">Leader</font> : Leaders are Joyers holding a leadership position.
<font color="#D69E3A">Provider</font> : Providers are organizations or companies offering products or services.
<font color="#D69E3A">Classic</font> : Classic Joyers are registered with a social title rather than a professional title.

Based on this classification, Joyers are registered under either social or professional titles, which correspond to one of five statuses: social titles fall under the Classic status, while professional titles fall under Celebrity, Proficient, Leader, or Provider statuses.

In light of these classifications, Classic Joyers have access to all social and professional features of the Joyers app, with the exception of offering or selling products and services online. They can request or purchase products and services from other Joyers but are not permitted to sell them. Conversely, Joyers with the Celebrity, Proficient, Leader, or Provider status can access all social and professional features of the Joyers app, including the ability to offer and sell products and services online to other Joyers.
Together, these statuses ensure every Joyer has access to features suited to their role or expertise.\n

<font color="#FFD700">Ghost</font> : Ghost Joyer’s (Following & Followers) are not seen by anyone, except the account owner.
